trans-unit.source: Score
trans-unit.target: Score

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning / Score
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning / Score

trans-unit.source: Scoring is the process of applying a trained model to new data to generate predictions and other values.
trans-unit.target: Scoring is the process of applying a trained model to new data to generate predictions and other values.

trans-unit.source: The scores you generate using the model can include:
trans-unit.target: The scores you generate using the model can include:

trans-unit.source: A list of recommended items
trans-unit.target: A list of recommended items

trans-unit.source: Forecasts, for time series models
trans-unit.target: Forecasts, for time series models

trans-unit.source: Estimates of projected demand, volume, or other numeric quantity, for regression models
trans-unit.target: Estimates of projected demand, volume, or other numeric quantity, for regression models

trans-unit.source: A predicted class or outcome, for classification models
trans-unit.target: A predicted class or outcome, for classification models

trans-unit.source: Probability scores associated with these outputs
trans-unit.target: Probability scores associated with these outputs

trans-unit.source: If data used as input when scoring against a model has missing values, the missing values are used as inputs, but nulls are propagated, which usually means that the result is also a missing value.
trans-unit.target: If data used as input when scoring against a model has missing values, the missing values are used as inputs, but nulls are propagated, which usually means that the result is also a missing value.

trans-unit.source: Module
trans-unit.target: Module

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Applies a well-specified data transformation to a dataset
trans-unit.target: Applies a well-specified data transformation to a dataset

trans-unit.source: Assigns data to clusters using an existing trained clustering model
trans-unit.target: Assigns data to clusters using an existing trained clustering model

trans-unit.source: Scores predictions for a dataset using the Matchbox recommender
trans-unit.target: Scores predictions for a dataset using the Matchbox recommender

trans-unit.source: Scores predictions for a trained classification or regression model
trans-unit.target: Scores predictions for a trained classification or regression model
